title: CDBurnerXP 4.5.7.6499
text: Rating: 5 (1606   CDBurnerXP is a free application to burn CDs and DVDs , including Blu-Ray and HD-DVDs. This is the installer version, CDBurnerXP Portable can be downloaded here .It also includes the feature to burn and create ISOs, as well as a multilanguage interface. Everyone, even companies, can use it for free. CDBurnerXP Features: burn all kinds of discs audio-CDs with or without gaps between tracks burn and create ISO files data verification after burning process create bootable discs bin/nrg â ISO converter, simple cover printing and much more!
